slides.title: Snippets handling
slides.description: Quick tour to create and use snippets in terminal window

slides.title: Code Snippets
slides.description: Click on the Code Snippets icon to see a list of common commands that you can send.

slides.title: Select Snippet
slides.description: Click on a Snippet to send it to the board.

slides.title: Memory Snippet
slides.description: The result of executing the command is shown in the Terminal Window.

slides.title: Edit Snippets
slides.description: To Edit Snippets, click on the Projects button.

slides.title: Manage Snippets
slides.description: Click on Trash to delete a snippet or enter a new Snippet Name and JavaScript code to add new one

slides.title: All Done
slides.description: That's all you need to know about Snippets!
